definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: The present study also include the influence of natural additives to D. candidum.
sentences.chinese: 本试验研究了天然添加物对铁皮石斛生长的影响。

sentences.english: Should I give my child fluoride supplements?
sentences.chinese: 我应该给孩子氟化添加物吗？

sentences.english: These admixtures added in conformance with manufacturers' recommendations.
sentences.chinese: 添加物应根据厂商推荐用量使用。

sentences.english: All the necessary small parts, the lubricants and additives, that will not be available.
sentences.chinese: 一切需求的小部件，光滑剂和添加物将变得不可得。

sentences.english: Table salt has a chemical added to make it white in color. Better alternative is Bragg's aminos or sea salt.
sentences.chinese: 食盐为使颜色变白而渗有化学添加物，最好选择海盐。

sentences.english: Table salt has a chemical added to make it white in colour.
sentences.chinese: 调味盐有使其颜色白的化学添加物。

sentences.english: The additives which we eat are not all so direct.
sentences.chinese: 我们吃到的这些添加物并非都是如此直接的。

sentences.english: Liquid admixtures may be measured and-added directly, which is a little less trouble.
sentences.chinese: 液体添加物要简单一些，端直按规定剂量加入即可。

sentences.english: The calcium in most supplements is bound to a form of salt called carbonate.
sentences.chinese: 钙常用的添加物是碳酸盐。
